products.title: Trial Balance Data Product
products.shortDescription: IFRS-compliant trial balance with ACDOCA journal entry lineage tracking
products.description: Enterprise trial balance system providing complete SAP S/4HANA ACDOCA universal journal entries with data lineage, quality metrics, and IFRS compliance validation. Supports multi-currency conversion, variance analysis, and automated commentary generation.

dataProducts.title: ACDOCA Journal Entries
dataProducts.shortDescription: SAP S/4HANA universal journal entries (ACDOCA table)
dataProducts.description: Complete ACDOCA universal journal entries with full field set including ledger, company code, fiscal year, document number, line items, G/L accounts, amounts in multiple currencies, debit/credit indicators, posting periods, and segment reporting dimensions. Each entry includes SHA-256 hash for lineage tracking and data quality classification.

dataProducts.title: Foreign Exchange Rates
dataProducts.shortDescription: Multi-currency exchange rates for financial consolidation
dataProducts.description: Exchange rates for converting amounts between currencies, supporting multiple rate types (standard, average, historical). Includes source tracking (ECB, Fed, SAP), validity periods, and conversion ratios for proper multi-currency accounting.

dataProducts.title: Trial Balance (Aggregated)
dataProducts.shortDescription: Aggregated trial balance by account with opening, closing balances
dataProducts.description: Aggregated trial balance entries showing opening balance, debit/credit movements, and closing balance for each G/L account. Includes account classifications (Asset, Liability, Equity, Revenue, Expense), IFRS categories, and data quality indicators. Derived from ACDOCA journal entries through validated aggregation pipeline.

dataProducts.title: Period-over-Period Variances
dataProducts.shortDescription: Variance analysis comparing current vs previous periods
dataProducts.description: Period-over-period variance analysis showing absolute and percentage changes in account balances. Includes significance flagging based on IFRS thresholds (BS: $100M or 10%, PL: $3M or 10%), AI-generated commentary for material variances, and drill-down capabilities to underlying journal entries.

apiResources.title: ACDOCA Journal Entries API
apiResources.shortDescription: REST API for querying ACDOCA journal entries
apiResources.description: RESTful API providing access to SAP S/4HANA ACDOCA universal journal entries with filtering, pagination, and data quality metrics.

apiResources.title: Trial Balance API
apiResources.shortDescription: REST API for trial balance queries

consumptionBundles.title: Trial Balance Analytics Bundle
consumptionBundles.shortDescription: Complete trial balance analytics and reporting
consumptionBundles.description: Comprehensive bundle providing access to ACDOCA journal entries, aggregated trial balances, variance analysis, and exchange rates with full lineage tracking and data quality monitoring.
